ref: 8812 práśaṁsati ʻ proclaims, extols ʼ RV., praśaṁsana -- n. Vedāntas., praśaṁsāˊ -- f. ʻ praise ʼ ŚBr. [√śaṁs]
Pa. pasaṁsati ʻ speaks out, commends ʼ, pasaṁsana -- n., pasaṁsā -- f.,

lang: Gāndhārī or Northwest Prakrit (as recorded in the Dharmapada ed. J. Brough, Oxford 1962)

ref: Pk. pasaṁsaï ʻ praises ʼ, pasaṁsaṇa -- n., pasaṁsā -- f.;
Si. pasasanavā ʻ to praise ʼ, pasasnā ʻ excellent ʼ, pasasa ʻ praise, fame ʼ.
